original_text: After all these people had seen him, Christ also appeared to me. I was like someone who was born at the wrong time.
korean_text: 맨 나중에 만삭되지 못하여 난 자 같은 내게도 보이셨느니라

sentences.original_text: After all these people had seen him
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 사람들이 그를 본 후에

sentences.original_text: who was born at the wrong time
